channel.title: Frame's
channel.description: Hey , is there any program to make your own client frame's ? thx.

item.title: Frame's
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Rune-Nation, post:10, topic:349036”]Go into the client folder and click filles/spirites There will be a bunch of pictures or folders there. All the images are located here

If not go to the Cache folder and look in the spirites for that folder

If you still cant find it then dont open any folders just go through the filles[/quote]

i lold irl

Read full topic

item.title: Frame's
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

Go into the client folder and click filles/spirites There will be a bunch of pictures or folders there. All the images are located here

If not go to the Cache folder and look in the spirites for that folder

If you still cant find it then dont open any folders just go through the filles

Read full topic

item.title: Frame's

item.description:

thx.[/quote]

Do you mean interfaces?

yes there is,http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,421270.0.html

item.title: Frame's
item.dc:creator: @plompke plompke
item.description:
@plompke wrote:

[quote=“Rune-Nation, post:6, topic:349036”]theres no point in codeing if theres programs for everything. If you dont want to actuaily put efford into it and do it yourself you wont get far…

Change the spirites in the filles/spirites folder , Cache / spirites or any other spirite locations. its the same as changeing the login box and the backround just replace the image and mare sure its the exact size as the previous image[/quote]omg dude, how the hell can i start with it then??? just search some pics orwhat -.-’

Read full topic

item.title: Frame's
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

theres no point in codeing if theres programs for everything. If you dont want to actuaily put efford into it and do it yourself you wont get far…

Change the spirites in the filles/spirites folder , Cache / spirites or any other spirite locations. its the same as changeing the login box and the backround just replace the image and mare sure its the exact size as the previous image

Read full topic

item.title: Frame's
item.dc:creator: @plompke plompke
item.description:
@plompke wrote:

[quote=“Rune-Nation, post:2, topic:349036”]what do you mean by frames?

If you mean spirites you can find them in the download section

If you mean backround and stuff you search your client folder for the desired picture and replace it dont make it smaller or bigger unless thatts what you are trying to do. if the spirite is too small or too big it screws you over[/quote]well , i basicly mean , the frame where you see the quests , stats , friend list etc

Read full topic

item.title: Frame's
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

what do you mean by frames?

If you mean spirites you can find them in the download section

If you mean backround and stuff you search your client folder for the desired picture and replace it dont make it smaller or bigger unless thatts what you are trying to do. if the spirite is too small or too big it screws you over

Read full topic
